title: Nine Inch Nails - With Teeth [Remaster] (DVD-A Stereo) 24/48 FLA
description:
Props to CYBERGODSIG for supplying the DualDisc iso used for this torrent. I used DVD Audio Extractor to rip the audio (which was 6 channel 24/48 MLP) to 6 channel 24/48 flac.

I re-mixed the DualDisc DVD-A 5.1 audio to stereo in audacity, bringing back all of the lost dynamics in both the CD and Stereo mix on the DVD-A.  Please note that the front two tracks were almost always brickwalled, so I decreased the bass in those tracks to bring back some dynamics in them, and then upped the bass track a little to compensate for the less bass.

I think it sounds a lot better than the CD, and you can hear a lot more details in the music than you could before (on average it is 6db lower than the CD). On top of that, it's in 24/48 (flac), so itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s pretty much perfect audio. If you really want 96khz sampling rate, use the SoX resampler in foobar.

I did edit some songs from the originals during the re-mixing, as some sounds are in center channel and are only on mono, and didn't give much stereo separation. Because of this, I took the mono track, doubled it, inverted one, and made it a stereo track. An example of this is during the bridge (not through the entire song) of "The Hands the Feeds".

You can find the "Dynamic Range Meter" results here:

Here are visual comparisons of the waveforms: 

CD Version: https://i.imgur.com/78Khrah.png

DVD Remaster: https://i.imgur.com/C8nzMSM.png

Please seed if you enjoy this torrent, and please leave feedback
